name: AI Center
author: AWENK AUDICO
description: An intelligent router to delegate prompts to the appropriate AI Provider or local model based on the task type.

properties.label: Prompt Source Variable
properties.description: The payload variable path containing the text prompt for the AI.

properties.label: Provider Mapping
properties.description: Maps task categories to specific AI endpoints.

output_schema.name: data.ai_result_text
output_schema.description: The text result from the AI.

output_schema.name: data.ai_result_image_url
output_schema.description: The image URL result from the AI.

output_schema.name: data.ai_result_audio_file
output_schema.description: The audio file path result from the AI.

output_schema.name: data.ai_result_video_url
output_schema.description: The video URL result from the AI.

output_schema.name: data.ai_result_code
output_schema.description: The code snippet result from the AI.

output_schema.name: data.ai_result_json
output_schema.description: The JSON data/analysis result from the AI.
